amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate Tennessee Valley Authority economic development funding of $16 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the TVA activities by $16 million. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funding for economic development activities of the TVA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 236, 1 Present (Roll no. 355).
